alert.note: Alert for Morris; Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 8:07PM EDT until April 22 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morris County in northern New Jersey... East central Sussex County in northwestern New Jersey... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 806 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Green Pond, or 7 miles south of West Milford, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Kinnelon, Boonton, Butler, Lake Telemark, Green Pond, Highland Lake, Vernon Valley and White Meadow Lake. This includes Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 46 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
